Sentencas: The simulation of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) that incorporates a detailed user-developed model was performed within the commercial flowsheet simulator Aspen Plus.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell reactor analysis and optimisation through a novel multi-scale modelling strategy

Sentencas: It allows modification of the SOFC's governing equations, as well as the configuration of the cell's fuel-air flow pattern at the flowsheet level.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell reactor analysis and optimisation through a novel multi-scale modelling strategy

Sentencas: Initially, the dynamic behaviour of single compartment of a cell was examined with a OD model, which became the building block for more complex SOFC configurations.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell reactor analysis and optimisation through a novel multi-scale modelling strategy

Sentencas: Secondly, a sensitivity analysis was performed at the channel (1D) scale for different flow patterns.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell reactor analysis and optimisation through a novel multi-scale modelling strategy

Sentencas: Thirdly, the effect of fuel and air flow rates on the predominant distributed variables of a cell was tested on a 2D assembly.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell reactor analysis and optimisation through a novel multi-scale modelling strategy

Sentencas: Finally, an optimisation study was carried out on the 2D cell, leading to a robust, optimal air distribution profile that minimises the internal temperature gradient.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell reactor analysis and optimisation through a novel multi-scale modelling strategy

Sentencas: This work forms the foundation of future stack and system scale studies.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell reactor analysis and optimisation through a novel multi-scale modelling strategy
